actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to extend the authorization for appropriations to carry out conservation and rehabilitation programs on military reservations.

summary.text: Extends the authorization for appropriations to carry out conservation and rehabilitation programs on military reservations. Authorizes an appropriation of $1,500,000 for each of the fiscal years 1973-1977. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 670f (b))

titles.title: A bill to extend the authorization for appropriations to carry out conservation and rehabilitation programs on military reservations.
